name: 2SidesPuzzle
description: There is a two players in every level. Movement with button on the screen so only using tap mechanic. This players are moving at the same time. One of the players ‘sun’ side and other ‘moon’ side. When PlayerSun moving right, PlayerMoon moving left. This creates many different movement options. These movement options make the puzzle even more difficult. Also limited movement and thats pushing player think about what will him/her next move. Players try to reach the finish from both characters' perspective.
